title: GxSTxV
author: GxSTxV
content: I want to share some websites that maybe much people knows them already but  i find so useful in cryptocurrencies market whether you are a trader or not and i hope someone will benefit from them.First we have CryptoQuant which gives you a big amount of data on most cryptocurrencies in the market millions of traders are using this website to predict the next move of any coin or token, beside sharing some analysis and next moves of market by combining between network data, market data and entity flow dataSecond website is well known as LunarCrush it’s a big platform for cryptocurrency and nfts with a large community, it’s the best place to spot the new trending tokens or altcoins that might explode and take the chance of making a big profit but also you should be carful on it because most of these alts are so volatile and can turn to 0 in any second.Third website is CoinMarketCal that i find so simple and very useful when it comes to crypto big events and news of all the market, as for now we have the Ethereum merge coming and it’s the biggest event now, we also find the dates and announcements of some good projects beside the ability of giving a rate for each project which going to make it easier to spot the scam projects If anyone has other websites that are useful please share them here in this topic so we all can benefit
